name: Full Basketball Game Free
description:
Full basketball is an addictive game designed for basketball fans! Show your basketball skills. Full Basketball has realistic graphics that will hook you to the game. Full Basketball game is complete basketball game for basketball sport lovers. Full Basketball game is loaded with 20 countries. Select your country and choose country of your choice to compete with. Full Basketball game is equipped with full and realistic basketball controls to give ultimate basketball experience to the player.
Game Features:
- Realstic Basketball gaming physics
- Amusing game graphics
- 20 different countries
- Free to play

How to play:
Select your country and choose your opponent country’s team to play with. Control the player by using navigation button, control the basketball by using pass and throw buttons. Make maximum baskets by showing your basketball skills. Dodge your opponent’s team players by passing the basketball.

For any suggestion / feedback for further improvements, feel free to contact us at wizloft@gmail.com
